sql_query: SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "New" INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "Pending"
question: What are the names and addresses of customers who have both new and pending orders?

sql_query: SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "New" INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "Pending"
question: Which customers have orders that are currently in the "New" and "Pending" stages?
